isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - ROCKWELL 9, 10, AND 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS - LUBRICATION AND MAINTENANCE - ADJUSTING THE LINKAGE FOR THE REMOTE CONTROL ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: ADJUSTING THE LINKAGE FOR THE REMOTE CONTROL ASSEMBLY
svcproc.para: Cab-Over-Engine vehicles use a remote control assembly on top of the transmission. Linkage connects the inner shift lever to a shift lever in the cab of the vehicle.
The linkage must be adjusted for correct operation. Refer to GROUP 13 - TRANSMISSION in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for the model being serviced.
